content: lay your head down and relax on a soft flowery bed with this comfortable crochet pillow stitched using 3 different shades of red heart all in one flower power this welcoming pillow is a gorgeous garden for your home decor practice single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch and more whether redecorating for the season or just adding a pop of color it s the perfect accent to elevate any space materials red heart® all in one™ flower power™ 8 8 oz/250g 417 yds/381 m contrast a forget-me-not 2012 1 ball or 10 squares contrast b bluebell 2006 1 ball or 10 squares contrast c marigold 2005 1 ball or 10 squares gauges 12 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 10 cm motif = approx 6 15 cm square measurements approx 18 x 30 45 5 x 76 cm to fit 20 x 30 51 x 76 cm pillow form
